sinks.name: addressesErrors
sinks.description: Gathered Addresses with errors, if an address fails exists checks it may appear more than once

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		address_id as long,
		address_type as string,
		address1 as string,
		address2 as string,
		address3 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		zipcode as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string,
		Fax as string,
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Addresses
source(output(
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CityStateCountry
AddressesWna assert(expectTrue(!isNull(address_id), false, 'addressIdNotNull', null, 'Address Id is null'),
	expectTrue(lower(address_type) == 'residence' || lower(address_type) == 'business', false, 'addressTypeValid', null, "Address is not residence or business"),
	expectTrue(address1 != "", false, 'address1NotBlank', null, 'Address1 is blank'),
	expectTrue(isInteger(zipcode), false, 'zipcodeNumeric', null, "Zipcode is not numeric"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(phone)) == 11, false, 'phoneNumberNot11digits', null, toString(phone) + " Invalid Phone number length"),
	expectTrue(regexMatch(email, `^\w+([-+.']\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]\w+)*$`), false, 'validEmail', null, email + " is an invalid email"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(Fax)) == 11, false, 'FaxNumberNot11digits', null, toString(Fax) + " Invalid Phone number length")) ~> AddressesValidation
AddressesValidation derive(address1 = upper(address1),
		address2 = upper(address2),
		address3 = upper(address3),
		address_type = initCap(address_type),
		phone = substring(phone, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(phone, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 8, 4),
		Fax = substring(Fax, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(Fax, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 8, 4)) ~> AddressesTransformation
Addresses derive(address1 = iif(isNull(address1), "N/A", address1),
		address2 = iif(isNull(address2), "N/A", address2),
		address3 = iif(isNull(address3), "N/A", address3)) ~> AddressesWna
AddressesTransformation filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
AddressesTransformation, Customers exists(Addresses@customer_id == Customers@customer_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerIDExists
Filter1, CustomerIDExists, CityStateCountryExists union(byName: true)~> Union1
AddressesTransformation, CityStateCountry exists(Addresses@city == CityStateCountry@City
	&& Addresses@state == CityStateCountry@State
	&& Addresses@country == CityStateCountry@Country,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CityStateCountryExists
AddressesTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AddressesClean
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0) ~> addressesErrors

source(output(
		address_id as long,
		address_type as string,
		address1 as string,
		address2 as string,
		address3 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		zipcode as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string,
		Fax as string,
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Addresses
source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as date,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as date,
		created_date as date,
		updated_date as date,
		effective_start_date as date,
		effective_end_date as date,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		product_id as long,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		issue_date as date,
		valid_till_date as date,
		account_status as string,
		credit_card_limit as long,
		interest_rate as double,
		tenure as long,
		service_charges as long,
		customer_id as long,
		fd_principal_amount as long,
		loan_collateral_value as long,
		loan_amount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Products
Addresses sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Customers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
Products sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customers
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(customer_id),
	count = count(customer_id)) ~> Aggregate1
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Customers select(mapColumn(
		occupation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy(occupation),
	count = count(occupation)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		occupation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		occupation as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Occupations
Select3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		customer_id as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerIDs

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		occupation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Occupations
Customers assert(expectTrue(!isNull(customer_id), false, 'custIDNotNull', null, "Customer Id may not be null"),
	expectTrue(upper(source_id) == "ERP", false, 'sourceIDERP', null, source_id + " is an invalid source id -- must be ERP"),
	expectTrue(first_name != "", false, 'firstNameNotBlank', null, toString(customer_id) + ": First Name must not be blank"),
	expectTrue(last_name != "", false, 'lastNameNotBlank', null, toString(customer_id) + ": Last name is blank"),
	expectTrue(gender == "Male" || gender == "Female", false, 'maleOrFemale', null, gender + ": is not a valid gender"),
	expectTrue(marital_status == "Married" || marital_status == "Single", false, 'maritalStatus', null, marital_status + ": is not a valid marital status"),
	expectTrue(avg_family_size > 0, false, 'avgFamilyNot0', null, toString(avg_family_size) + ": is an invalid family size. Must be numeric and cannot be 0."),
	expectTrue(income_level == "Low" || income_level == "Medium" || income_level == "High", false, 'incomeLevelValid', null, income_level + ": is invalid income level. Must be Low-Medium-High"),
	expectTrue(length(identifier) == 11, false, 'identifierLength11', null, identifier + ": is invalid identifier. Must be 11 characters long.")) ~> ValidatedCustomers
ValidatedCustomers derive(source_id = upper(source_id),
		first_name = upper(first_name),
		middle_name = upper(middle_name),
		last_name = upper(last_name)) ~> customersTransformed
customersTransformed filter(isError()) ~> hasErrors
customersTransformed, Occupations exists(Customers@occupation == Occupations@occupation,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> OccupationExists
hasErrors, OccupationExists union(byName: true)~> Union1
customersTransformed sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomersClean
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomersErrors

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customers
source(output(
		address_id as long,
		address_type as string,
		address1 as string,
		address2 as string,
		address3 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		zipcode as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string,
		Fax as string,
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Addresses
source(output(
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> cityStateCountry
source(output(
		product_id as long,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		issue_date as string,
		valid_till_date as string,
		account_status as string,
		credit_card_limit as long,
		interest_rate as double,
		tenure as long,
		service_charges as long,
		customer_id as long,
		fd_principal_amount as long,
		loan_collateral_value as long,
		loan_amount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Products
source(output(
		sr_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		sr_description as string,
		sr_open_date as timestamp,
		sr_close_date as timestamp,
		sr_type as string,
		channel as string,
		sr_cust_feedback as string,
		feedback_type as string,
		feedback_severity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SRS
source(output(
		transaction_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		merchant_name as string,
		transaction_description as string,
		transaction_amount as long,
		type_deposit_withdrawal as string,
		transaction_date as timestamp,
		channel as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Transactions
customers1, customerCountries join(customers1@customer_id == customerCountries@customer_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		customer_id = customers1@customer_id,
		country,
		age = dob,
		gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDCountry
Join2 derive(credit_score = toInteger(random(1)*215 + 600),
		age = toInteger(monthsBetween(currentTimestamp(), age) / 12),
		has_credit_card = iif(has_credit_card > 0, true(), false())) ~> DerivedColumn1
Customers aggregate(groupBy(customer_id,
		dob,
		gender),
	count = count()) ~> customers1
Exists1 aggregate(groupBy(customer_id,
		country),
	count = count()) ~> customerCountries
Addresses, cityStateCountry exists(Addresses@country == cityStateCountry@Country,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
customerIDCountry, ProductInfo join(customerIDCountry@customer_id == ProductInfo@customer_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Products aggregate(groupBy(customer_id),
	tenure = sum(tenure),
		number_of_products = count(),
		has_credit_card = countIf(product_type == "CREDIT CARD" && account_status == "open", customer_id),
		is_active = iif(countIf(account_status == "closed") == count(), false(), true()),
		exited = !iif(countIf(account_status == "closed") == count(), false(), true())) ~> ProductInfo
Join4 select(mapColumn(
		customer_id = customerIDCountry@customer_id,
		credit_score,
		country,
		gender,
		age,
		tenure,
		deposits,
		withdrawls,
		number_of_products,
		has_credit_card,
		avg_feedback_score,
		is_active,
		exited
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
SRS aggregate(groupBy(customer_id),
	avg_feedback_score = countIf(feedback_type == "Positive") / iif(countIf(feedback_type == "Negative") == 0, 1l, countIf(feedback_type == "Negative")),
		positive = countIf(feedback_type == "Positive"),
		negative = countIf(feedback_type == "Negative")) ~> avgFeedbackScore
Transactions aggregate(groupBy(customer_id),
	deposits = iifNull(sumIf(type_deposit_withdrawal == "D", transaction_amount), 0),
		withdrawls = iifNull(sumIf(type_deposit_withdrawal == "W", transaction_amount), 0)) ~> depositsWithdrawls
avgFeedbackScore, depositsWithdrawls join(avgFeedbackScore@customer_id == depositsWithdrawls@customer_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
DerivedColumn1, Join3 join(customerIDCountry@customer_id == avgFeedbackScore@customer_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
RemoveColumns1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customer_id as long,
		credit_score as integer,
		country as string,
		gender as string,
		age as integer,
		tenure as long,
		deposits as long,
		withdrawls as long,
		number_of_products as long,
		has_credit_card as boolean,
		avg_feedback_score as double,
		is_active as boolean,
		exited as boolean
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> Churn

source(output(
		product_id as long,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		issue_date as timestamp,
		valid_till_date as timestamp,
		account_status as string,
		credit_card_limit as long,
		interest_rate as double,
		tenure as long,
		service_charges as long,
		customer_id as long,
		fd_principal_amount as long,
		loan_collateral_value as long,
		loan_amount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Products
Products select(mapColumn(
		product_name,
		product_type,
		product_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductNames
Products select(mapColumn(
		product_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductIDs
SelectProductNames aggregate(groupBy(product_name,
		product_type,
		product_description),
	count = count(product_name)) ~> Aggregate1
SelectProductIDs aggregate(groupBy(product_id),
	count = count(product_id)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		count as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductNameTypeDesc
Aggregate2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		product_id as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> productIDs
Aggregate2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['productsIDsCSVTest'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		product_id as long,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		issue_date as timestamp,
		valid_till_date as timestamp,
		account_status as string,
		credit_card_limit as long,
		interest_rate as double,
		tenure as long,
		service_charges as long,
		customer_id as long,
		fd_principal_amount as long,
		loan_collateral_value as long,
		loan_amount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Products
source(output(
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		count as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ProductNameTypeDescList
Products1 assert(expectTrue(valid_till_date >= issue_date, false, 'validAfterIssueDate'),
	expectTrue(lower(account_status) == "open" || lower(account_status) == "closed", false, 'accountStatusOpenClosed'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(product_id) && isInteger(toString(product_id)), false, 'productIDNotNull')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 derive(product_name = initCap(product_name),
		product_type = upper(product_type),
		product_description = upper(product_description),
		issue_date = toString(toDate(issue_date), "MMM-dd-yyyy"),
		valid_till_date = toString(toDate(valid_till_date), "MMM-dd-yyyy")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1, Customers exists(Products@customer_id == Customers@customer_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerIDExists
Filter1, CustomerIDExists, NameTypeDescExists union(byName: true)~> Union1
DerivedColumn1, ProductNameTypeDescList exists(DerivedColumn1@product_name == ProductNameTypeDescList@product_name
	&& DerivedColumn1@product_type == ProductNameTypeDescList@product_type
	&& DerivedColumn1@product_description == ProductNameTypeDescList@product_description,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NameTypeDescExists
Products derive(valid_till_date = iif(isNull(tenure), addMonths(issue_date, 36), addMonths(issue_date, tenure))) ~> Products1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductsClean
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> productsErrors

source(output(
		sr_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		sr_description as string,
		sr_open_date as timestamp,
		sr_close_date as timestamp,
		sr_type as string,
		channel as string,
		sr_cust_feedback as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> srs
srs select(mapColumn(
		sr_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
srs select(mapColumn(
		channel
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy(channel),
	count = count(channel)) ~> Aggregate1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(sr_type),
	count = count(sr_type)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		channel as string,
		count as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> channels
Aggregate2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		sr_type as string,
		count as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> srTypes

		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

source(output(
		sr_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		sr_description as string,
		sr_open_date as timestamp,
		sr_close_date as timestamp,
		sr_type as string,
		channel as string,
		sr_cust_feedback as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,

	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> SRS
source(output(
		sr_type as string,
		count as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

source(output(
		product_id as long,

	),

source(output(
		channel as string,
		count as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> channels
DerivedColumn1 assert(expectTrue(!isNull(sr_id), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_description) > 0 && length(sr_description) <= 100, false, 'descriptionLength'),
	expectTrue(sr_close_date >= sr_open_date, false, 'validCloseDate'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_cust_feedback) > 0 && length(sr_cust_feedback) <= 100, false, 'custFeedbackLength')) ~> Asserts
Asserts filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Filter1, custIDExists, prodIDExists, srTypeExists, channelExists union(byName: true)~> Union
Asserts, Customers exists(SRS@customer_id == Customers@customer_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> custIDExists
Asserts, productIDs exists(SRS@product_id == productIDs@product_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> prodIDExists
Asserts, srTypes exists(SRS@sr_type == srTypes@sr_type,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> srTypeExists
Asserts, channels exists(SRS@channel == channels@channel,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> channelExists
SRS derive(feedback_type = iif(
    reduce(split(sr_cust_feedback, " "), false(), #acc || in(["fantastic", "great", "satisfied", "satisfactory", "satisfaction", "happy", "serve", "served", "serving", "timely", "prompt"], lower(#item)), #result),
    "Positive",
    "Negative"
    ),
		feedback_severity = case(    
    reduce(
        split(sr_cust_feedback, " "), 
        false(), 
        #acc || in(["should", "interest", "quicker", "quick", "switch", "switching", "bank", "need", "needs", "horrible", "terrible", "bad", "unhappy", "about" ,"very"], lower(#item)), 
        #result
        ),    
    "High",    
    case(
        reduce(
            split(sr_cust_feedback, " "), 
            false(), 
            #acc || in(["timely", "higher", "high", "prompt", "committed", "improve", "improved"], lower(#item)), 
            #result
            ),    
    "Medium",
    "Low"
    )   
)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Asserts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		sr_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		sr_description as string,
		sr_open_date as timestamp,
		sr_close_date as timestamp,
		sr_type as string,
		channel as string,
		sr_cust_feedback as string,
		feedback_type as string,
		feedback_severity as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SrsClean
Union sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> srsErrors

source1 select(mapColumn(

Select1 aggregate(groupBy(merchant_name),
	count = count(merchant_name)) ~> Aggregate1

Transactions assert(expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_id) && isInteger(toString(transaction_id)), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_amount) && isInteger(toString(transaction_amount)), false, 'transactionAmt'),

Assert1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Assert1, Customers exists(Transactions@customer_id == Customers@customer_id,

Filter1, productIDExists, channelExists, customerIDExists, merchantExists union(byName: true)~> Union1
